Event.name: Invasion_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Invader</fen> enters a land in an attempt to dominate the <fen>Attacked</fen> and they either fail or succeed.</def-root>

Arg.name: Invader
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Invader</fen> is the entity that overtakes the <fen>Attacked</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Attacked
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Attacked</fen> is the land, government, and its people that is seized by the <fen>Invader</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the intensity and extent of the invasion event. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The manner in which the <fen>Invader</fen> takes over the <fen>Attacked</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action by which the conquering event is made possible through the efforts of the <fen>Invader</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Invader</fen> takes over the <fen>Attacked</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The tool used by the <fen>Invader</fen> to seize the <fen>Attacked</fen>.</def-root>
